div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 372 Olynthus, Macedonia, 1931 (758) Burial: c. 348 B.C. (Clement) Contents: 34 AR. From excavations Acanthus: 1 tetradr. Chalcidian League: 33 tetradr. Disposition: Athens Robinson, Olynthus VI, pp. 12-3, illus. Robinson-Clement, Olynthus IX, pp. 171-3, illus. (hd. IV) Schwabacher, AJA 1938, pp. 74-6 (authenticity of 6 Dikaios tetradr.)
